channel.title: Vb progress bar
channel.description: Me and my friend made a vb program that appends about 510k lines of text to a file, how would we set up a progress bar that actually worked, it can take up to 5-10 minutes so we need the progress bar but we can't seem to get one to work...

item.title: Vb progress bar
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Make the progress bar.

I named mine pbar. Then basically:

In a timer.

pbar.Enabled = True
pbar.Style = ProgressBarStyle.Blocks
pbar.Increment(1)

This was for some shitty thing, but from pbar.style you can get 3 different options and from there it’s fairly obvious.

You can make it so 1 block = 1 line of the text being transfered or something, just go to the properties and screw around.

If you show me the proper code I can build it in for you

Read full topic
